author: The Caucasian Yeti
comment: Good app, helpful to do my college classes. However with one of these recent updates, it's killed the calendar. No assignments or due dates show up whatsoever for me. And yes, I do have all the correct calendars turned on in the settings.  Edit: The calendar is still broken unfortunately. When will it be fixed, do you have a date on the next update?

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hello,
Our engineers are aware of a few bugs with the calendar that should be fixed in the next release for the Student app. Please let us know if you continue to see these issues after the app is updated to the most recent version.

author: Ruby King
comment: New design is hard on the eyes. Constant drops of app and loss of work while doing required responses. Every semester I have to go thru a process to uninstall, clear and reinstall to be able to access/view the calender of my current classes. Customer service is mediocre to resolve issues.

author: Michelle Rajotte
comment: Despite installing and reinstalling several times, I am unable to see any grades. All of the classes and assignments are there, but I cannot get any grades to appear. ** Response to developer's reply:  thanks for the info, but I have already ensured that show grades is turned on, and I have also submitted a trouble ticket but never received a response.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Michelle,
Please refer to this guide to display grades on your Dashboard: https://community.canvaslms.com/docs/DOC-13662-18555446334. You can also use the Report a Problem link if this doesn't solve the problem.

author: Jack Young
comment: Even after the most recent update there are issues with the to-do widget. All of the items compress into one unreadable "to-do" and the only way to get them to show up properly is to delete the widget and replace it on the screen. This would be such a great feature if it worked properly. It's so close to being 5 stars.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Jack,
Thanks for your review and letting us know about what you see when using the To Do widget. Could you please use the Report a Problem link to detail what the problem and the device you are using? This will send the issue to our Support team so they can look into it further.

author: Richard Sequeira
comment: I very rarely give out reviews, but the new update drastically changed not only the layout but does not allow me to see my courses in the app. The older version was just fine and this update affects my ability to remain in the class.

author: jorge orduno
comment: Sucks! TO MANY COMPATIBILITY ISSUES! I can not even read my online book... All that's on my screen when I click on any chapter is a big white screen. GOOD LUCK TRYING TO FIX IT.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hello Jorge,
We're really sorry to hear that you are experiencing some issues with accessing course content using the Canvas Student app. Will you please use the Report a Problem link in the app to let our support team know about this issue. This will allow someone to look into this issue and figure out what can be done to help.

author: MA Sierra
comment: Very easy to use. Helpful when I'm on the go. Load times are a bit show. Recently though, nothing will load. This has been an issue for about 2 months now. The app is completely unusable because nothing will load at all

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hello Sierra,
I'm sorry to hear about the trouble you are experiencing with the Student app. If you are able, please use the Report a Problem link in the app so someone can look into this further. You may want to try re-installing the app to see if it corrects the issue.

comment: I am quite confused. When I open the app, it asked me to enter my school then leads me to my school login page. After I sign in, all I see is what I see on my desktop. It looks nothing like the screenshots provided in the app description. Basically, this app offers no additional functionality compared to using a regular browser.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi there,
I'm sorry to hear that you are experiencing some confusion when attempting to use the app. I'm not exactly sure why the app would open to the mobile version of Canvas. Will you please use the Report a Problem link from the Help menu to let someone know about this issue.

author: DAVID HART
comment: Worthless app that doesn't do anything. Can't login with my tablet, and I'm using the exact same user name and login that work on my phone. Even on my phone that actually logs in, I can't do anything other than look at grades. I am forced to use canvas through the browser on my phone or tablet if I want to actually get work done.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi David,
We're sorry to hear that you are experiencing some issues with using the Canvas Student app. Could use please use the Report a Problem link in the app to let Canvas Support know about the issue you are experiencing with logging in to the app on your tablet.

author: Ben Waga
comment: It's great and helps me keep up-to-date with all my school work. The recent redesign is terrible and makes things even harder to find. It takes sometime getting use to but it's still trash user experience. For that it loses a star.

author: ashley goode
comment: The updated version of this app takes so much longer to load than the old version. I used to be able to click on the app and open it immediately. Now i have to wait atleast a good minute or so before anything will load. I also dont have notifications when i get messages. The old app would show me when i had a message. Terrible update!!!!

author: Carson Wallace
comment: Really good for keeping up on assignments. The fact that most professors have online turn-ins and record their lectures makes it so I can miss days without worrying.  The to-do list won't let me "mark as done" assignments that don't need a submission. Assignments that say "turn in" before their name do however.  It's not deal breaking, but it gets annoying to keep looking at assignments that I've already completed. It would be great if an update would add marking all types of assignments as complete sometime soon.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Carson,
Thank you for your review! You can share your idea for an addition to the Canvas Student app here: https://community.canvaslms.com/community/ideas

comment: After the most recent update, single sign on (SSO) via my institution is required to access any part of the course. The resulting page is simply the desktop version of Canvas. In it's current functionality it is no better than a web browser that doesn't support mobile web pages.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hello,
Can you please use the Report a Problem link from the app's Help menu so someone can look into this further? We're sorry for any inconvenience that this has caused.

author: Samg Clifford
comment: When I attempt to log in it kicks me out to the school page upon a successful login so I am unable to login to the app. I'm on a Galaxy s8, android 7.0. Updated: nothing changed, same issues still occurring.

author: Anna Lopez
comment: Works well but modules with books do not load properly. I also would like to see different options on the gradebook. Since the default shows grades based on graded assignments I was under the impression that I had an 97% on one of my fast track classes. It turns out my grade was in the 70% range. I noticed it 2 weeks before my class was done.  I didn't know the couple of missing assignments had such a huge impact because of the way the point system displayed. The what if score feature is nice but it's not near as important seeing your true grades like the professors would see it. I am still going to be able to pass the class with a B but if I knew my true grade sooner, I would have made sure all my other assignments were completed to maintain my A+.

author: Jonathon Skinkle
comment: great app for checking assignments and grades.  I do wish that the app had the functionality that the web application has that strikes through the assignment when you have completed it.  The new interface/update is much better and more user friendly.

author: Jaylen X
comment: I loved this app to get all my assignments done but somehow lately it's been crashing on me, i could be in the middle of an assignment and it will log me out. Doesnt change no matter how much I restart it. It's making me very frustrated.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Jaylen,
We're really sorry to hear that you are experiencing some app crashes when trying to submit your assignments. Please use the Report a Problem link in the app to let us know what is happening so we can work on fixing that issue.

author: tim tegtman
comment: Every single time I get on this app and am trying to finish very important homework as my classes are all online. I just got kicked out of an extremely important test 6 different times. please fix IMMEDIATELY

author: Ms Chaotic
comment: App is poorly designed to the point where simply going into the internet to the website is more convenient then using the app. It has less then what the website has and is only good for checking your current grade and when things are due. Do not download, just use the website. If you download it and you try using certain functions on the site it takes you into the app.

author: Francisco Ramirez
comment: Good app, updated regularly, have had a few issues with lag and freezing but rarely so it's not a bother. My only issue is actually with the widget, would give 5 stars no problem if it would show my notifications and update as posted.

author: Stephany Muntean
comment: The app is convenient for me because I'm on the go all day and carrying my laptop can be a hassle.  Unfortunately it crashes every time I try to paste in my discussion board. My instructor tell us to use word to help spell check and keep a work count, but when I copy my paragraph Canvas just won't let me paste it in without crashing.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Stephany,
Please use the Report a Problem link in the app to let us know about these app crashes. Someone can look into this further and see what might be going on.

author: Paul Daily
comment: Can you allow downloads of submitted files even if nothing can open it? I need to open links in my primary browser, not whatever your app does. Also I can't submit feedback and bug reports in the app because you automatically close them. It doesn't keep awake during video playback and stops videos buffering when the screen goes dark.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Paul,
A fix for the widgets should be coming very soon, hopefully in the next few weeks. Make sure to keep your app updated so you can receive that fix when it happens. To share your feedback on downloading files, please visit Canvas Studio: https://community.canvaslms.com/community/ideas

author: Jordan Mielbrecht
comment: Their app has gotten a lot better since the newest update(s). The interface used to be such an eyesore, but now I feel comfortable using it.

author: Hilary Srei
comment: Very easy to use. Only downside so far is when you're sending emails via Canvas you can't send more than one attachment at a time.

author: Savannah Paramo
comment: I have this app on my old phone and it wont let me access the school on my new phone. It says the  website is not authorised  for use which makes  no sense since i have been using it.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Savannah,
When searching for your school, you should see a link appear titled Tap here for help. Please use this link and someone can reach out to you and help find your school in the app.

author: Ashley Olsen
comment: I have not been receiving push notifications. I have made sure they are all checked. I'm not sure what the deal is. My husband hasn't been getting notifications either. Love it otherwise. Response to Developer: I made sure notifications are enabled and I am still not getting any notifications.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Ashley,
Please make sure that your notifications are enabled correctly: https://community.canvaslms.com/docs/DOC-9576-18555333857. You can also use the Report a Problem link in the app to let someone know that you are experiencing these issues.

comment: This new design is not intuitive nor does it look good. I find it confusing that the side panel has nothing to do with my classes. I am used to going there often but now there's nothing there I use. Also the icons on the bottom look bad and the animation for switching between icons doesn't look good.
Works great. Seems to crash whenever i try to write a post but I can use my computer so no biggie.

author: Brent Dunkel
comment: Mp4 lectures are still not working even after submitting help tickets and I have noticed that there at least one update since my last review.   Don't get me wrong this app is awesome, but the not having the access to lecture videos is frustrating.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hi Brent,
Sorry to hear that you are experiencing some issues with videos in the app. Can you please use the Report a Problem link in the app to let someone know about this. Someone can look into it and let you know how it can be resolved.

author: japneet singh
comment: Pointless can't see my courses so that's means I can't answer my discussion questions I have to go to desktop version on phone

author: Ballerboi123
comment: Good app overall, but needs to be fixed. When I click my home button and go to recent apps, it doesn't show up and I have to click on it again. It doesn't even save progress. I need assistance asap.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hello Ballerboi123,
For assistance with using the Canvas Student app, please use the Report a Problem link in your app's Help menu. Someone can reach out to you and help solve this problem.

author: Rafael Uribe
comment: The latest update has been a great improvement. The current quarter is shown with only the classes I am taking and the user interface had been greatly simplified. Great job developers!

author: Mitchel Larsen
comment: Very useful app. Some functionality is missing for example viewing feedback on assignments doesn't work but it does allow you to contribute to discussion boards from wherever you are, upload assignments, or read announcements.

author: Josh Gardner
comment: Can't navigate using the new UI. It's completely different from the web UI and is very unintuitive. No way to see old classes either.

author: Afeez Oyeleke
comment: Amazing app stopped me from having to go on university website to get information about my course. And you can link it with your Google account

author: Damilola Akintoye
comment: At first canvas worked. But the new update prevents me from seeing notifications and doesn't show me my current grades in classes. I've reinstalling the app several times but it hasn't done anything.

reply.author: Instructure
reply.content:
Hello, 
Please use the Report a Problem link in your app to let us know what is happening so someone can look into this further. Thanks!

author: Ariel Olson
comment: It's nice to have everything I need for class available on my phone. Very easy to use, especially after using Canvas on the computer all the time.

author: Naa Adjorkor Tetteh
comment: Notifications doesn't work for me... They don't appear unless I open app

author: Nanda Ramakrishnan
comment: Doesn't work. Not able to see current quarter grades. Feb 2018

author: anastacia Phelps
comment: New layout is bad. Calendar always shows no events. Even when there is some.
